comments.body: nit: createStressTest --> runStressTest (because it does not just create the stress test, it actually runs it)
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,33 @@

+
+package org.apache.spark.sql.streaming
+
+import org.apache.spark.sql.StreamTest
+import org.apache.spark.sql.execution.streaming._
+import org.apache.spark.sql.test.SharedSQLContext
+
+class MemorySourceStressSuite extends StreamTest with SharedSQLContext {
+  import testImplicits._
+
+  test("memory stress test") {
+    val input = MemoryStream[Int]
+    val mapped = input.toDS().map(_ + 1)
+
+    createStressTest(mapped, AddData(input, _: _*))
